gmail_setup: 1. Enable 2-factor authentication on your Google account
3. Generate App Password for 'Mail' on 'Windows Computer'
4. Use that 16-character password (not your regular password)
5. Copy this template to email_config.json and fill in credentials

custom.note: Use your email provider's SMTP/IMAP settings

security_notes: ⚠️  NEVER commit email_config.json to Git (add to .gitignore)
⚠️  Use App Password, not your main account password
⚠️  OrionKernel will only access its own inbox
